channel.title: Work Experience on Jayaprakash Akula
channel.description: Recent content in Work Experience on Jayaprakash Akula

item.title: 3D Hand Tracking in the wild
item.description: The project involves predicting accurate 3D hand positions in world space using multiple cameras including monochrome fisheye cameras and depth ToF sensor.

item.title: JumpShot - Multi Human Pose Estimation
item.description: This work uses multi-human pose estimation at the core along with posture detection.
